function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Improving filtration and ventilation processes within HVAC systems","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Thorough review and evaluation of HVAC systems and their suitability for the pandemic situation","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Upgrade filters to MERV, inspect and maintain local exhaust ventilation","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Circulate outside air, increase exhaust ventilation, use portable HEPA air cleaners","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Do not use ozone generators, electrostatic precipitators, or ionizers","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of effective TB infection control measures","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of exposure limits and safety protocols for UV light and ionizer use","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of effective air purification systems, environmental control measures, and prompt diagnosis and treatment","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of administrative control measures, environmental control measures, and personal respiratory protection","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Evaluating and modifying HIV care programs to reduce congregating of highly susceptible individuals, implementing effective air purification systems, prompt diagnosis and treatment","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Supplementing natural ventilation with other environmental control measures","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting efficacy studies in clinical settings","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Repositioning exhaust vents to ensure proper air circulation and ventilation","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Replacing wire mesh floors with solid floors or implementing additional infection control measures","category":"Selection of materials","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing strict protocols for UV light maintenance, monitoring UV exposure levels, and providing protective measures for healthcare staff and patients","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict quarantine measures, regular health monitoring, and air treatment to minimize the risk of disease transmission","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitor and control ozone levels, limit exposure duration, and provide ventilation in the ionizer area","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establish proper handling and disposal protocols, provide training to staff, and maintain biosecurity measures","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular maintenance and inspection of UV lights and fans to ensure proper functioning","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementing redundant air sterilization systems and regular air quality testing","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict quarantine measures for the guinea pigs and regular health monitoring","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement effective infection control measures in the control group, such as UV lights or ionizers","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Balance the airflow between animal enclosures to ensure equal distribution of air","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure thorough review and validation of statistical analysis methods","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of infection control protocols, isolation, and personal protective equipment PPE","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular maintenance of ventilation systems, improvement of air circulation, use of filtration systems","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Strict adherence to ethical guidelines, oversight by veterinary professionals, ethical training for researchers","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular monitoring and limits on negative ion concentration","category":"Control of airflows (airtight / negative pressure)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of specialized air filtration systems and regular testing for TB in the chambers","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Separation of TB-infected animals, regular testing, and infection control measures","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of the built environment, use of UVGI disinfection systems","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting further research to determine the most effective air purification technology for TB prevention","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of upper-room UV light or negative air ionization as control measures","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Expert installation and post-installation checking of UV fields to ensure no excess UV light is reflected downwards. Use of shielded UV fixtures.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Appropriate positioning and installation of modern, shielded UV fixtures. Checking of UV fields to ensure no excess UV light is reflected downwards. Use of personal UV meters to measure exposures.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of upper-room UV light intervention in waiting rooms, out-patient and emergency departments, and anti-retroviral treatment facilities","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement a proactive maintenance program for regular bulb replacement and adhere to manufacturer’s recommendations","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Develop lower-cost UV fixtures and bulbs suitable for resource-limited settings, explore cost-effective UV technologies","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Augment convection currents with mechanical ventilation systems or inexpensive mixing fans","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing mechanical ventilation systems and mixing fans to improve air mixing","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Conducting controlled studies to evaluate the effect of upper-room UV on human-to-human TB transmission","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Monitoring and controlling relative humidity levels to stay within optimal range for UV germicidal efficacy","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct further studies to understand ionizer effectiveness in healthcare environments and implement alternative measures to prevent TB transmission","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Monitor and evaluate the impact of ionizers on medical equipment, and implement alternative technologies or grounding methods to mitigate static charge interference","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide comprehensive training on proper handling and cleaning of ionizers","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct testing with artificial aerosols to evaluate airflow patterns and particle loss","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct specific studies to evaluate ionizer effect in different areas of the facility","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement effective prevention measures for TB transmission, including environmental control measures","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct additional studies in clinical settings to support the use of environmental control measures","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Additional studies to characterize true latent TB infection, strains virulence, and PPD conversion","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"}]}
